post:
The shared hosting packages available at bodHOST include less features but should be more than enough to get your blogging journey up and running. The prices start from $1.99. We are so confident in our hardware resources than we have also included a 30 days unconditional money back guarantee. Also, you get 24*7 customer support from our technical experts, who have answer to all your queries. You are paying $1.99 to get started but in return you are getting 100x the value.

The Shared Hosting Plans are as below -
